# Prop Funding Codes

> Best promo codes and discounts for prop trading firms. Verified daily.

## Prop Firm Directory
- [Apex Trader Funding](/prop-firms/apex): 50% off with promo code OTBAOPUX
- [Bulenox](/prop-firms/bulenox): Exclusive verified discounts
- [TopStep](/prop-firms/topstep): Verified promo codes
- [Take Profit Trader](/prop-firms/take-profit-trader): 40% off with code NOFEE40

## Platform
- [NinjaTrader](/ninjatrader): The #1 futures trading platform for prop trading.

## Resources
- [All Promo Codes](/promo-codes): Complete list of verified coupons.
- [FAQ](/faq): Common questions about evaluations, payouts, and rules.
- [Request a Firm](/request-firm): Suggest new prop firms for us to track.

## Data Structure
We provide structured data on:
- Profit Splits (typically 80-90%)
- Drawdown Rules (Trailing vs EOD)
- Account Sizes ($25K - $300K)
